#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#define ll long long
#include <algorithm>
#define MOD 1000000007
using namespace std;

inline ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
	 return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b);
}

ll a;
int main()
{
   int n;	
   cin>>n;
   
   ll gs=0;
   
   for(int i=0 ; i<n ; i++)
   {
      scanf("%lld",&a);
      gs=gcd(gs,a);
   }
   
   while(gs%2==0)
    gs/=2;
 
    
    printf("%lld\n",gs);
	return 0;
}
